channel.title: Poll: Drunk Driving
channel.description:
[b]Do you think people should be allowed to drive after drinking alcohol?[/b]
[img]http://img116.imageshack.us/img116/7462/25607547mg0.jpg[/img]
22% said yes. What does this tell us about Scotland?
(link= http://news.scotsman.com/topics.cfm?tid=1620&id=1094682007)

item.title: Poll: Drunk Driving
item.dc:creator: @Taios Taios
item.description:
@Taios wrote:

[quote=“TheBeanie, post:5, topic:124931”]The people who cant handle it shouldnt.

but say like my dad, he can have shit loads and he can still drive ok[/quote]

No. he means:

I can have shit loads and i THINK i am still ok.

After 1-2glasses. Your reaction time decreases.

Read full topic

item.title: Poll: Drunk Driving
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

[quote=“Casey., post:8, topic:124931”]I’ve heard of cars that have breathalysers in them, and won’t start if your above the limit.
Thats kinda cool.[/quote]

Thats only if youve gotten multiple DUI’s, as pixels said. But it would be a good idea, only problem is that what if it malfunctions in an unopprutune time? In the middle of nowhere? Its clocking you at .34 and you havent had a drink in days? your fucked in the pooper.

Read full topic

item.title: Poll: Drunk Driving
item.dc:creator: @kurt pixels
item.description:
@kurt wrote:

[quote=“Casey., post:8, topic:124931”]I’ve heard of cars that have breathalysers in them, and won’t start if your above the limit.
Thats kinda cool.[/quote]

Yeah, I’ve got some friends that have that; but that is because they’ve gotten multiple DUI…

item.title: Poll: Drunk Driving
item.dc:creator: @lordslayer565 lordslayer565
item.description:
@lordslayer565 wrote:

Casey.:

My suggestion: Make a road out of marshmallows, so if they crash, they don’t harm others, and get to have a tasty snack.

Casey > Gov
[/Offtopic]
No. Well only on Casey’s new invetion. I think there should be terms of item on beer cans.

item.title: Poll: Drunk Driving
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

[quote=“Casey., post:3, topic:124931”]no
Tbh, probably smart-ass kids who think they’re so fucking funny by voting yes.

These people go twanka, ok, have fun, but don’t drive.
I’ve lost friends to drunk drives.

I’d expect Ireland to be 1000x worse though.

My suggestion: Make a road out of marshmallows, so if they crash, they don’t harm others, and get to have a tasty snack.[/quote]
I also have lost friends to drunk drivers, two of my closest friends.

Read full topic
